value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Zacharias... Where do you think he is
right now?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I have no idea. All I know is that he
vanished without a word.$k$pHe was our friend. Why did he hide
his identity from us? And why has he
chosen to side with Embla?$k$p$EFace_Anger|I need to understand what's going on.
We have to find him.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Get ready, then! We have fresh
information on Prince Bruno—no,
Zacharias.$k$pNow's your chance to find out the
answers you're looking for. He's in
the World of Radiance. Let's go!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Another...dead end. I search, and I
search...but nothing. I learn...nothing.$k$pMy time...is running out.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Urgh... Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Please... Tell me. What's happened
to you? I can't understand what you're
doing!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|In the end, all of Embla's royalty...are
devoured by the dark god. We become
puppets...$k$pI can't fight the blood flowing through
my veins.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|God? What god is this? Tell me!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|As a prince, I carry the cursed blood
of Embla.$k$pYet in Embla...I was despised by the
royal family. Both my mother and I
were...$k$pThey claimed she shared imperial
secrets with Askr... and they
imprisoned her for it.$k$pShe died in isolation... Thanks to their
cruelty.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|And me? I was cast out—sent to the
border.$k$pAssuming a new identity, I entered
Askr. I became your friend...$k$pThese were necessary steps toward
destroying Embla, my homeland.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|But that Emblian blood pulses within
me. Whatever I do, I live knowing
one thing: its curse will consume me.$k$pHad I stayed at your side, I would
have killed you and your sister. So I
left.$k$p$EFace_Pain|And I sought a way...to fight it.
Urgh... Ghk!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias? What's going on?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Time's up.$k$pRun. Run now! Before I kill you!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Rrrgh...$k$pNo, not yet... Not...yet!$k$pUrgh... Ha-ha... Hee-hee-hee... Oh,
children of Askr...it's time to die. Die in
agony!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias! Wait!$k$p$Sbs150|
